basics.name: Julio Moreno Yanes
basics.label: Programmer
basics.summary: Systems Engineer with work experience of more than 9 years in ICT. With fast learning skills and a great enthusiasm for new technologies. I specialize in the Python programming language and its various frameworks in which I am currently growing in different languages and libraries.With a huge background on different technologies and branches of the ICT like cybersecurity, devops, Frontend (using react and react native), Geospace databases, software arquitecture and scrapping data.

work.name: Freelancer
work.summary: I work as a freelancer since the begin of my career as a developer using different technologies mostly using Python and React. I work in different projects likes bank applications, inventory apps, buy and selling products with billing, and ia agents for automation responses and data gathering using differents tecnologies
highlights: Build complex applications for bussiness and banks using Python and React
Deploy applications in servers and clouds, mostly with docker
Optimized process and performance of systems
Scrapping data from websites

work.name: Fisotec Solutions
work.description: company with over 15 years of experience offering technological solutions and operational consulting related to the development of GIS and infrastructure for smart cities
work.summary: In this project I have been able to work with Qgis and geolocation databases to implement a service for different electrical and water projects in differents towns at Spain
highlights: Create endpoints using native Python that modify the logic and presents information with performance
Create reports and statistics with big data inside the projects using Postgis and sql queries
Optimized process and performance of systems
Develop UI with PyQT5
Refactor code and data flows
Manage and implement geospace databases with Postgis and Postgresql

work.name: Servicepad
work.description: Smart contract systems solutions to modernize, streamline, and automate solutions for manufacturers, builders, dealers and RTO management companies to create extreme efficiency.
work.summary: Inside my job as a Senior Backend developer, I have to create efficiency endpoints and data manipulations using Python (Flask) and Java to provide to the Frontend developers all the logic that is needed.
highlights: Arquitecture changes and creating data models for a extends used
Queries and ORM queries for present data and filled documents for esings
Refactor code and data flows
Flask and Java implementation as microservice
Creating PDF to be config, filled and signed
Docker, commands and pipelines configurations

work.name: Unow Solutions (Contractor in Veridas)
work.description: The company that i work for was veridas through unow solutions. In veridas the main objective was create with the purpose of guaranteeing people's right to use their real identities in the digital and physical world.
work.summary: In Veridas my main objective as a Senior Fullstack developer was created a demo for clients using the best technologies of Python (Django) and React. Also i have to created all the CI/CD and automatization testing inside this demo for clientes
highlights: Implement Selenium and cypress for web application testing
Refactor code and data flows
Innovates with the frontend development using the best arquitecture and practices implementing SOLID, functional components and styled components in the native way without libraries
Creating commands with python to execute pipelines
Creating Docker containers for the projects and deploys
Interact with native components like Camera
Update the Django project for new and better arquitecture
